extendedInfo.description: The URTv camera application enables you to record and upload your movies onto urtv.co.il easily.Taking part in URTV programs means you're taking part in creating the new TV!Features:Choosing participating programs through the application.Filming a movie up to 3 minutes long,Fast upload speed in the background.Saving a movie in the device's library.Uploading existing movies from the camera's gallery.
